ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 975
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, Oddly enough you could solo one (well go into one alone). I was in a group of 5 where suddenly we lost two people (before even getting to adv start)
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all,

Oddly enough you could solo one (well go into one alone). I was in a group of 5 where suddenly we lost two people (before even getting to adv start) and then the other two folk decided to bag the adventure. So, just for Ha-Has, I took my shaman into the adv to do some foraging (some of the rarer forages sell for 50-100pp a pop on the Nameless). Lack of common sense got the better of me and I tried some of the mobs... the first multi-pull sent me running for the exit... :)

Ciao,
Miracht Riversfriend,
51 Shaman, The Nameless
Champions of Cabilis
> Message: 3
> Date: Fri, 26 Mar 2004 00:48:39 -0700 (Mountain Standard Time)
> From: "flaumigevylke" <flaumigevylke@...>
> Subject: Re: Adventuring
>
> Well first you have to make sure you have the expansion Lost Dungeons of
> Norath, once you have that then you join a band of adventures of around your
> level, maximum of 6 member with a spread of no more then 7 levels between
> the highest and lowest. The group leader then goes and gets the adventure
> for the group, sorry but they won't let a solo in and you all have to have
> the expansion enabled and have your adventure stones. Just one way they have
> of making you group with people to have fun and see naked as someone
> possibly all of you will die on it at some time or another. You'll have a
> main looter who loots and then sells after the adventure and splits the
> proceeds between you all, items drop from the mobs which are no drops and
> you roll on them, there's also some pretty nice things drop that you'll want
> to roll on.
>
>
>
> Flaumigavylke
>
> Quellious
